TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputCacheSettingsSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class OutputCacheSettingsSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置应用程序页的输出缓存设置。

span.span: Configures the output cache settings for application pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许你以编程方式访问和修改 `outputCacheSettings` `caching` 配置文件中的节的元素。The class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `outputCacheSettings` element of the `caching` section in a configuration file. 输出缓存设置定义依赖关系 (在缓存中存储的项与文件、缓存键或 在输出缓存中使用的对象) 之间的关系，例如，通过 [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) 指令或 。The output cache settings define the dependencies (the relationships between items stored in the cache and files, cache keys, or objects) that are used in output caching, for instance, by the [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) directive or by the . > [!NOTE] > 根据值为的节属性所定义的限制，可以将信息写入配置文件的相关部分 。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 在层次结构中不允许在配置文件中写入的任何尝试都会导致分析器生成错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，可以使用此类在层次结构中的任何级别上读取配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/CS/OutputCacheSettingsSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/VB/OutputCacheSettingsSection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以 使用方法获取类的实例 。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputCacheProfiles As OutputCacheProfileCollection

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许以编程方式访问 `outputCacheProfiles` 配置文件中的元素。The property allows you to programmatically access the `outputCacheProfiles` element in a configuration file. 您可以使用 属性以 `outputCacheProfiles` 编程方式修改元素。You can use the property to modify the `outputCacheProfiles` element programmatically. `outputCacheProfiles`节包含 对象，这些对象表示可由应用程序中的页使用的输出缓存设置。The `outputCacheProfiles` section contains objects that represent output cache settings that may be used by pages in the application. 通过设置 `CacheProfile` [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) 指令的属性，可以将这些设置应用到页面。These settings can be applied to a page by setting the `CacheProfile` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) directive. 应用配置文件来控制缓存属性，如依赖关系、缓存位置和缓存过期时间。Apply the profile to control caching attributes such as dependencies, cache location, and cache expiration time. [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100))指令可以覆盖 除属性之外的所有设置 。The [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) directive can override all the settings contained by an except the property. 这是为了确保可以启用或禁用， 而无需修改可能已覆盖的所有页面中的指令。This is to ensure you can enable or disable the without having to modify the directives in all the pages that might have overridden it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/CS/OutputCacheSettingsSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/VB/OutputCacheSettingsSection.vb#3)]
